    F

    FilesProcessor - Class in ie.atu.sw
    The FileReader class is responsible for processing file operations: Buffered file reading with a progress indicator Lowercased word tokenisation without punctuation Similarity report writer Thread-safety: builds maps using ConcurrentHashMap.
